sharedContent.title:
A New York public school principal sent a letter to white parents advocating for “white abolition” and urging students to become “traitors” to their race 

School employees are forced to attend presentations denouncing the white race’s “paternalism” and “power hoarding” -NYP https://t.co/paLXxgbhen
sharedContent.author: Breaking911

localize.full_text: RT @Breaking911: 纽约一所公立学校的校长给白人家长发了一封信 倡导 "废除白人 "并敦促学生... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text:
纽约一所公立学校校长给白人家长发信，鼓吹 "废白"，敦促学生成为种族的 "叛徒"。

学校员工被迫参加谴责白种人 "家长制 "和 "权力囤积 "的演讲--NYP https://t.co/paLXxgbhen

localize.full_text: RT @Breaking911: 紐約一所公立學校的校長給白人家長髮了一封信 倡導 "廢除白人 "並敦促學生... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text:
紐約一所公立學校校長給白人家長髮信，鼓吹 "廢白"，敦促學生成爲種族的 "叛徒"。

學校員工被迫參加譴責白種人 "家長制 "和 "權力囤積 "的演講--NYP https://t.co/paLXxgbhen
